channel.title: Old C4D shatter tutorial(56k warning)
channel.description:
I made this quite awhile back when i was first into graphics, i posted it on runestatus/avatorium and thought someone might learn a little from it here, its not the best but maybe someone can learn something from it lawl.Ignore the text as i sucked at text back then..
outcome [b][i][u]with grad map[/u][/i][/b] [IMG]http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f88/wixter/tut-rs.jpg[/img]
and one w/o [IMG]http://i45.photobucket.com/albums/f88/wixter/tut1.gif[/img]
[b][i][u]Tutorial[/u][/i][/b]... enjoy
[center][left][URL=http://imageshack.us][IMG]http://img119.imageshack.us/img119/3461/runestatustutorialwr8.jpg[/img][/URL][/left][/center]

On another topic

why make it an image instead of just fucking typing it

because you then have images to illustrate whats going on “A picture is a thousand words” nice tutorial dude.
